about.description:
watex is a Python library to solve engineering problems
in the field of groundwater exploration. It brings
intelligent approaches for reducing numerous losses
during the hydro-geophysical exploration projects via
the geophysical, hydrogeology, and geology methods.
The library minimizes the unsuccessful drillings,
unsustainable boreholes, reduce the cost of the
hydrogeology parameter collections, predict the
groundwater flow rate, the level of water
inrush, recover the electromagnetic loss signals...
about.summary: Machine learning research in water exploration

about.description:
watex is a Python library to solve engineering problems
in the field of groundwater exploration. It brings
intelligent approaches for reducing numerous losses
during the hydro-geophysical exploration projects via

The library minimizes the unsuccessful drillings,

about.summary: Machine learning research in water exploration

name: watex
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "watex" %}
{% set version = "0.1.8rc1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/WEgeophysics/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2986ea4825c126752e77486895e7b0a6d05749c2f7eb8fa458a0466f2b762813

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - version= watex.cli:version
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.9
  run:
    - cython >=0.29.33
    - numpy >=1.23.0
    - scipy >=1.9.0
    - pandas >=1.4.0
    - pyyaml >=5.0.0
    - openpyxl >=3.1.1
    - seaborn >=0.12.0
    - joblib >=1.2.0
    - six >=1.16.0 
    - xgboost >=1.5.0
    - pyproj >=3.3.0
    - python >=3.9
    - setuptools
    - pytables >=3.6.1
    - h5py >=3.2.0
    - scikit-learn ==1.1.2
    - threadpoolctl ==3.1.0
    - matplotlib-base ==3.5.2
    - tqdm 
    - click 

test:
  imports:
    - watex
    - watex._build
    - watex.analysis
    - watex.cases
    - watex.datasets
    - watex.datasets.data
    - watex.datasets.data.edis
    - watex.datasets.descr
    - watex.etc
    - watex.exlib
    - watex.externals
    - watex.externals._pkgs
    - watex.geology
    - watex.methods
    - watex.models
    - watex.utils
    - watex.view
  commands:
    - version --help
  requires:
    - pytest

about:
  home: https://github.com/WEgeophysics/watex
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Machine learning research in water exploration
  description: |
    watex is a Python library to solve engineering problems 
    in the field of groundwater exploration. It brings 
    intelligent approaches for reducing numerous losses 
    during the hydro-geophysical exploration projects via 
    the geophysical, hydrogeology, and geology methods. 
    The library minimizes the unsuccessful drillings, 
    unsustainable boreholes, reduce the cost of the 
    hydrogeology parameter collections, predict the 
    groundwater flow rate, the level of water 
    inrush, recover the electromagnetic loss signals...
  doc_url: https://watex.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/WEgeophysics/watex

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - WEgeophysics
